trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when the persistence service cannot fulfill a request.
trans-unit.target: Unntaket oppstod når utholdenhet-tjenesten ikke kan utføre en forespørsel.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService> throws a PersistenceException if it cannot complete a request to commit either a completed scope or the workflow instance state to its database.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService>oppstår en PersistenceException hvis den ikke kan fullføre en forespørsel om å utføre en fullstendige område eller tilstanden arbeidsflyten forekomst til databasen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService>

trans-unit.source: If you implement a persistence service by deriving from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService> class or the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService> class, you can throw the PersistenceException with an appropriate message to indicate any error condition encountered by your service that prevents it from fulfilling a request made by the workflow runtime engine.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du implementere en fast tjeneste ved avledes fra de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService>klassen eller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService>klasse, kan du throw PersistenceException med en melding til å angi en feilbetingelse ble oppdaget av tjenesten som hindrer den i å fullføre en forespørsel av arbeidsflyten runtime motoren.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService> class for more information.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException"></xref> class by using the specified message.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException"> </xref> klassen ved hjelp av den angitte meldingen.

trans-unit.source: A description of the cause of the exception.
trans-unit.target: En beskrivelse av årsaken til unntaket.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException"></xref> class by using the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and the specified <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException"> </xref> klassen ved hjelp av den angitte <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> og den angitte <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren kalles under deserialisering til reconstitute unntak objektet overføres via en dataflyt.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=108569&clcid=0x409).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [XML og SOAP-serialisering](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=108569&clcid=0x409).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> som inneholder dataene som serialiserte objektet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that holds contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>som inneholder kontekstavhengig informasjon om kilden eller målet.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException"></xref> by using the specified message and <xref:System.Exception>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException"> </xref> ved hjelp av den angitte meldings- og <xref:System.Exception>.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: A description of the cause of the exception.
trans-unit.target: En beskrivelse av årsaken til unntaket.

trans-unit.source: The exception that caused the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException"></xref> to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Unntak som forårsaket av <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException"> </xref> til å bli utløst.
